sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default class OrderDetail extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ orderdetail:[] } } orderid = this.props.match.params.id componentDidMount(){ fetch("/orderdetail/:"+this.orderid) .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((row)=> this.setState({orderdetail: row})) } render(){ return(
Ma Don Hang: {this.state.orderdetail[0].orderid}
Trang Thai Don Hang: {this.state.orderdetail[0].orderstatus}
Thong tin dat hang
Nguoi dat hang: {this.state.orderdetail[0].name}
Dia Chi: {this.state.orderdetail[0].address}
So Dien thoai: {this.state.orderdetail[0].phone}
Hinh thuc thanh toan
Thanh Toan Tien Mat
Tong gia tri don hang
Tong Tien(Truoc Giam Gia): {this.state.orderdetail[0].total}
Giam Gia: {this.state.orderdetail[0].promotion}
Tong Tien(Phai Thanh Toan): {this.state.orderdetail[0].total - this.state.orderdetail[0].promotion}
{this.state.orderdetail.map((product)=> )}
Mon An Gia So luong Tong Cong
{product.productname} {product.price} {product.quantity} {product.price}
) } }
